comment: She has a great personality, cares a lot about science. But, she takes a while to grade all of your assignments. It is the middle of the year & we only have 4 lab reports graded out of 9. Hard to contact outside of class. Explains procedure well before we start the lab. After asking a bunch of questions she does get annoyed.

Dr. Brown-Barber is a very hardworking professor with multiple jobs and children so she often late to class and is very behind on grading. Besides that she is a very nice person, reminds me of Bailey from Grey's Anatomy. If you do not attended the labs, you will 100% fail. There is a decent amount of homework and a harsh no late work policy.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She is a rude and very strict lab professor who dosent care what your excuses are when not turning in assignments. Late grader and usually shows up late to class. Gets annoyed when you ask questions but overall, she's not horrible. Just be wary of the due dates of all the labs and quizzes and content assessments.

Professor Barber was a great professor. She was always willing to answer any question anyone had. I also loved how she went over the lab before we started so that we would have some knowledge on how the lab would go. Overall, this was a great class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Lab was online this semester because of COVID so I'm sure that I would've had a better experience if it was in person. She is very funny and is good at answering any questions you have. Chemistry is hard but this is a solid professor to take for lab.

NOT easily accessible outside of class. Dr. Barber doesn't "care" for students, but also doesn't "NOT Care". She is understanding towards students, for lack of better terms. VERY STRAIGHT FORWARD. Follow all that she states and/or what is in the Syllabus. Take if you don't mind "working for your grade". If you like "easy A's", AVOID!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: I took this class about a year ago and it was straight forward. She explained how to succeed in her class. She was quite tough on her grading but overall a simple class.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She is a nice person but doesnt seem to be all that interested in her students. A lot of work and very specific about how she wants everything done, but if you do the work its not hard to pass
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She requires SO much work to be done before you even get to lab. You have to buy the manual but barely use it. Her grading is ridiculous, she'll count everything wrong if there is a tiny error. She is weeks behind on grading, she acts bothered when you ask questions, and considers pretty much everything to be cheating. She is a nice person though.
